website_summaries.verdict: If long wear and precision lines are your top priorities, this liquid pen is likely to impress. The bold color is perfect for dramatic looks.
pros: Liquid eyeliner formula that goes on smoothly and wears as long as 24 hours
Pen has a refined brush tip that makes creating thin or thick lines and winged looks easy
Lasts through tears, sweat, and rain without transferring, smudging, or flaking
cons: Like any liquid eyeliner, it's difficult to correct if you make a mistake
Requires a good eye makeup remover

customer_reviews.title: Jesus Take the Wheel, this stuff is good
customer_reviews.text: I wear eyeliner every single day of my life and this stuff is the cat's pajamas!! It's my very favorite because it's easy to put on, and very precise. It's also not hard to get off if you make a mistake!! I would recommend it to anyone who wears eyeliner because of the high quality and the sharp look. Also, the pen tip doesn't break down or get stubby over time so you can use it just like new until you run out. I wear it every day and it literally lasts forever!! I think I have bought 2-3 since June 2017 and it's currently March of 2019. This stuff rocks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Stead

customer_reviews.title: Real Product, Lower Price
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I don't know what happened to all the reviewers that are complaining this is fake. I've purchase from here twice and not had a problem. It's usually $2-4 less than buying directly from Clinique and is the real deal as far as I can tell. Plus I don't have to pay for shipping or *shudder* go to the mall. For those of you unfamiliar with the product entirely-- it is amazing! Glides on beautifully smoothly, great control, nice and dark, stays on all day. Be careful when putting the cap back on though. One time when I did, some of the individual hair/bristles/fibers/whatever got folded under somehow and now they're kinda stuck, sticking outwards.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply eyeliner pen.
customer_reviews.text: I have finally found an eyeliner pen that is easy to apply and stays one all day. I want a thin upper lid line and I have tried every kind of eyeliner pen from Kat Von D to Maybelline etc. This is the first and only pen that goes on easily and does not have to be corrected. It just flows on your eyelid while some pens seem to go on uneven and almost bumpy. I love this and highly recommend for those who want a subtle line on their eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia K  Frits

customer_reviews.title: The product was not fuctional
customer_reviews.text: The eyeliner I ordered with the "Clinique" brand was dried up and unable to be used. The box it arrived in appeared to be tampered with as well. A $20 purchase that was not functional. I will not be ordering these types of products again from Amazon. Ever.
customer_reviews.author: talk alot

customer_reviews.title: Great product, may need to buy from Macy’s?
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this Clinique eyeliner when I buy it from Clinique - but the only I bought from Amazon was already drying out upon receipt & doesn’t paint the nice, smooth eyeliner lines I’m used to. Wish someone would offer a me replacement!
customer_reviews.author: Allison B.

customer_reviews.title: Skimpy eyeliner product
customer_reviews.text: I generally write positive reviews, but not this time. I purchased 2 of these items. I ended up throwing the first tube out in the trash after one or two applications because there was hardly any liquid in the eyeliner. I don't know if it was old eyeliner or what? The second tube had more liquid, but it required many applications to get the black color to stay on my lid. I won't buy this product again. Barbara W.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara W.

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I think this is the best eyeliner I have bought. It is so easy to use. It slides on with a perfect line. I bought the black an it makes your eyes pop. It's easy to do a winged eyeline and make a thin or thick line. I am going to buy the brown one too.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is the best I have used in a VERY long time. Most bother my eyes, but not this one. It goes on nicely and stays on well also. Pretty pricey..yes. Worth it..YES!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: perfection
customer_reviews.text: I am an artist who focuses as ink as main medium. This eyeliner is a dream come true. A perfect wing cat eye look every time. Can make a SUPER SHARP POINT gets right in the lash line. forgiving for a couple second with a damp cotton swab. If it is in your cart buy it. Does well over top eye makeup
customer_reviews.author: Christian G.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is my all time favorite eyeliner. The applicator looks like a very thin paintbrush, which allows for controlled and precise wings. The eyeliner itself is the perfect jet black color. It shows up over textured eyeshadow. It is smudge and practically water resistant (lasts through raves and water parks). Not to mention, this eyeliner will last you a long while. Whenever I think it’s all gone I run the brush under the sink for half a second and then the color is back!
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any look!
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is so easy to use and perfect for a cat eye look! The end has a sharp point which I love. The color is so bold and it doesn't smear or fade. This liner works well for day or night looks.
customer_reviews.author: MaKaylea

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner!!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried so many eyeliners and this one blows them all out of the water. It allows you too easily create a thin straight line. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: HanSch

customer_reviews.title: Best black liquid eye liner I've used.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about Clinique Liquid Eye Liner, but it is kind of expensive for me. It doesn't run and can go on thin, which is how I like it. Doesn't make a very thick line. It goes on thin and moderately thick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product came dried out
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to open my new eyeliner today when my old one was getting dried out . . . it was more dried out than my old one . . . doesn't work at all!
customer_reviews.author: Roger - Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Long Wearing
customer_reviews.text: Continues to be my favorite black eye liner & I've tried many & tossed them. Nearly waterproof wear and glides on so easily. Does not irritate my eyes at all. Thank you for carrying this great Clinique product.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner ever!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best eyeliner I’ve ever used, especially for a felt tip. It looks better with two coats though, not very dark
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Super easy - goes on smooth - doesn't tug on the eye lid
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite eye liner by far. Minimal pressure and plenty of eye liner comes out. Does not tug on the eye lid. Leaves a smooth line. I've only used Black. Hint, Store with pen side down for maximum use.
customer_reviews.author: ValJane

customer_reviews.title: Love this eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I've never been good at applying liquid eyeliner until now. I love this product. It makes a thin line and is so easy to control.
customer_reviews.author: ShefNBama

customer_reviews.title: Best eye liner
customer_reviews.text: Best eye liner I ever bought! It’s very easy to apply and stays all day. I recommend !
customer_reviews.author: sandrine

customer_reviews.title: My one and only!
customer_reviews.text: I had only used pencils before this, but once I discovered how easily this glides on (even for a beginner), I was hooked. It's been my one and only for 10 years now.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Opstad

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I love this eye liner! It’s a user friendly liquid liner. It’s easy for me to get the look I want and I’m not makeup expert.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Old products
customer_reviews.text: I only use this eyeliner. When receiving from Amazon it was old and very dry.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Much better than pencil eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply and doesn’t wear off. Much Lasted for a very long time and didn’t dry out in the tube.
customer_reviews.author: Midwesterner

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many liquid liners, and this is my favorite. It's easy to apply and lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Julipop

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: Goes on smooth! Easy to apply! No runs, no errors! Best eyeliner I’ve ever used! Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner ever
customer_reviews.text: Best eyeliner ever, and this is so incredibly easy to apply! Stays on all day, and washes off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Newman

customer_reviews.title: New favorite eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this liner! The tip is so thin I get the perfect cat eye every time. Wears all day and washes away clean. Will be the only eyeliner I use again.
customer_reviews.author: AngelaH417

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is great for the mature, creepy, upper lid. Easy to manipulate & goes on smoothly & stays. Easy removal. Great
customer_reviews.author: robbie wagnon

customer_reviews.title: Water resistant
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite eyeliners. Water resistant and very easy to use. Lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very difficult time with eyeliner and getting it on just right. No problem with this eyeliner! Will continue to order this!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Cady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lines
customer_reviews.text: I really do love this eyeliner. It’s very easy to apply and goes on very smooth. It stays on great. It makes the perfect fine line.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Precision application can become difficult
customer_reviews.text: All & all this is a pretty nice liner. The only big downside is that when closing the lid. The lid bends the hairs of the liner up and out and it’s ruins the application precision.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: DRY PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I tried to use the eyeliner but it was dry....wouldn't even put a black line on my eye
customer_reviews.author: Frances Trejo

customer_reviews.title: Less product in tube every order
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little frustrated with this eyeliner. Although I love the way it goes on, it seems like it lasts fewer and fewer days every time I buy it. Does the manufacturer put less in the tube now than in the past?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New favorite
customer_reviews.text: This became my new favorite eyeliner after the first use. I don’t always use eyeliner so sometimes mine dry up in a couple of weeks, but this one is still great after a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Tamia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is so easy to put on eye liner with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Great Eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner. Easy to put on, doesn't smudge and stays until I take it off. No need to touch up throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Liquid was so faded as if it’s old I usually get this from Macy’s but with the whole pandemic when stores were closed I figured get it from here but it when right to the garbage waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Eleni740

customer_reviews.title: Not clinique
customer_reviews.text: This is a deluded version and not the real product.
customer_reviews.author: doug pettitt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I used to hate liquid liner til now!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite liquid eyeliner. I refuse to buy a different kind . It goes so smooth and the lines are perfect & nice and black
customer_reviews.author: Kinga

customer_reviews.title: Priceless
customer_reviews.text: My eyes are sensitive to certain eyeliners this is the only one that don’t make my eyes itch or red
customer_reviews.author: Ellie new bed

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Stays on all day
customer_reviews.text: This is the only eyeliner I use now. I love it. Stays on all day!
customer_reviews.author: birdwatcher

customer_reviews.title: Best liquid eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyeliner! Able to make the perfect wing with this eyeliner!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Yay!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite everyliner. I’m very happy to have found it on Amazon with prime shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: This product was nothing like the original sample I received from Clinique. I am so mad. Do not buy from this seller
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: As close to a perfect mascara as you will find on earth
customer_reviews.text: I tried out this mascara two years ago, and that was the end of the trials. This is the one and only.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Came empty!
customer_reviews.text: I used it twice and then it was totally dried up. Not happy about this.
customer_reviews.author: Shari D. Good

customer_reviews.title: received dried eye liner
customer_reviews.text: My eye liner was expired and dried when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Bad hairs split liner
customer_reviews.text: The pencil hairs always split second purchase and starts amazing then in a month hairs split making it i useable
customer_reviews.author: S. Shore

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: seems as if it was used before It was sent to me. Not ample liquid.
customer_reviews.author: thom barnard

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it for the money- gave me an eye rash
customer_reviews.text: Not too crazy about this eyeliner and would rather buy one from a local store. I love eyeliner and wanted to get a good quality eyeliner. After the first few uses I started to get a rash by my eye. I started eliminating make up products one by one to figure out the culprit. The last thing I eliminated was this eyeliner and my rash immediately cleared up. I’ve also used many brands of eyeliner for over 10 years and never had an issue. I don’t recommend this product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smudges, comes off, worst eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the worst eyeliner Ive ever owned. I purchased it after a lady at ulta told me clinique eyeliner liquid stays on all day. That could not be farther from the truth. Ive been putting this on every morning for my desk job mind you, and within 2 hours it’s underneath my eye (when I only put it at the top) and then when I try to get it off it leaves underneath my eyes dark like Ive been in a boxing match. Don’t waste your money, this is the worst eyeliner Ive ever had and will NOT be purchasing ever again.
customer_reviews.author: LolaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Glides on easy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used many liquid pen eyeliners from store bought brands to expensive brands from Sephora (Kat Von D, Dior, Urban Decay, Tarte etc). It glides on very smoothly and the actual liner tip is flexible to create wings. I do have oily eyelids, so when it comes to smudging, all eyeliners smudge for me unless I use a pot eyeliner. I like this eyeliner for quick, everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Tinzy

customer_reviews.title: Hypoallergenic but doesn’t last all day long
customer_reviews.text: This is great! It does not bother my sensitive eyes. I just wished it lasted all day. I probably just need to get a waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Leed

customer_reviews.title: Works very well with sensitive eyes
customer_reviews.text: My wife has sensitive eyes, and some products have resulted in significant allergy issues. This is now her go-to product. Goes on well and does not irritate her eyes at all. Very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Orion

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner ever
customer_reviews.text: I use this to do my liner every day. The picture posted is after a full day of teaching AND a nap. This stuff is the best eyeliner around, no difference from Amazon and buying at a Clinique counter.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Bergman

customer_reviews.title: Orf
customer_reviews.text: This was dried up when I got it. The last one that I got from Clinique's website lasted 6 months or more.
customer_reviews.author: pickyrdr60

customer_reviews.title: Dried out FAST!
customer_reviews.text: I used this 5 times and it dried out. When I bought it directly from Clinique it lasted MUCH longer. But the product itself is great. Easy to apply and stays on.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Good eyeliner but this one is not exactly the same as the one I had before but it is the same eyeliner... I have tremors and it is very difficult to use liquid but this one is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Goforth

customer_reviews.title: Stays Put
customer_reviews.text: Tried this for a wedding 2 years ago, not only did it last in the tube for over a year but it stays put and doesn't end up on my eyelids!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Kay

customer_reviews.title: Last a long time
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply. Stays on all day. Great quality makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Lenkowsky

customer_reviews.title: Dias
customer_reviews.text: Not so easy to use. Did not stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: 99kidsmama

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner. Highly recommended. It dries instantly and it lasts all day long.
customer_reviews.author: DGemini

customer_reviews.title: The only kind I will ever use!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this eyeliner. Very slim and goes on so smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L. Olson

customer_reviews.title: I love how easily this goes on and that I can ...
customer_reviews.text: I love how easily this goes on and that I can totally control how thin or wide the line will be. It goes on very smoothly. It stays on all day without smudging yet washes completely off st night. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: My favorite liquid liner
customer_reviews.text: I love this liner so much. Brush pens are so much easier to use and don't drag liner felt tip pens, and provide such a clean line. The black color is pigmented and just great!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply, doesn't smudge or run, lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply, doesn't smudge or run, lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: sdvegas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Make good lines, love the product and It's easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mariela

customer_reviews.title: My fave eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of liquid eyeliners in the past, but this is my favorite. It stays put all day and all night.
customer_reviews.author: Clarice K.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and I have used it before.
customer_reviews.author: Mary  Dave Cichos

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It works much more smoothly than pencils. Easy to apply. Stays on.
customer_reviews.author: Jhmd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite eyeliner ever! You can make the thinnest lines with this eyeliner! Doesn't dry out easily
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Since our local Macy store closed really convenient to get a product my wife loves and uses regularly
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Buskirk

product_meta.title: Clinique Pretty Easy Liquid Eyelining Pen | Precision Brush with 24-Hour Smudge and Budge-Resistant Wear | Ophthalmologist Tested | Free of Parabens, Phthalates, and Fragrance | Black - 0.02 oz
product_meta.description: Color:No. 1 Black for WomenThe Clinique Pretty Easy Liquid Eyelining Pen is a mistake-proof pen that creates a clean line in one steady sweep. Tapered, precision brush paints on pure, deep colour from thin to thick. 24-hour smudge and budge-resistant wear. Ophthalmologist Tested. Allergy Tested. 100% Fragrance Free.
feature_bullets: Clinique's mistake-proof pen creates a clean line in one steady sweep. Tapered, precision brush paints on pure, deep colour from thin to thick
All the drama of a liquid eyeliner without the drama of putting it on
Create thin lines, thick lines, tight lines, cat eye designs, and more
Ophthalmologist Tested. Allergy Tested. No parabens. No phthalates. 100% Fragrance Free. Just happy skin
